EmailTemplate.name: Ignite - More Tickets
EmailTemplate.subject: Extra Tickets Released for Ignite Birmingham
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A limited amount of extra tickets have now been released for Birmingham's Ignite event.
More space has been acquired in the venue to meet the extra demand. Tickets will be allocated through http://ignitebirmingham2014.eventbrite.co.uk on a first come first served basis, so sign up quick!
